description:
The mix-and-matched members talk about movie theaters, but when Kanon oddly boasts that she`s never been to one, they all decide to go together, a dangerous prospect considering this group. But afterwards they discuss how movie theaters could be improved, such as having wet seats. Later, the original Tesaguri members are live at the zoo, where they`re lucky enough to watch and be watched by procreating animals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Movie Theaters and Zoos
映画館と動物園で遊ぼう
